member.name: T:Utility.Information
member.summary: Provides some common functions from Visual Basic programs you cant in C# programs.

member.name: M:Utility.Information.IsDotNetAssembly(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the file is a .NET assembly.
member.returns: true if the file is a .NET assembly; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Utility.Information.IsNumeric(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified expression is numeric.
member.returns: true if the specified expression is numeric; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Utility.Information.IsNothing(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified value is null.
member.returns: true if the specified value is null; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Utility.Information.ExecutablePath
member.summary: Gets the path for the executable file that started the application, including the executable name.

member.name: P:Utility.Information.ExecutableDirectory
member.summary: Gets the directory the application's executable file resides in.
